```{r}
# install.packages("here")  # INSTALL IF NEEDED
library(here)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

setwd(here())  # Sets working directory to the project root
population <- st_read(here("map_1/populated_places/ne_10m_populated_places.shp"))
airports <- st_read(here('map_1/airports/ne_10m_airports.shp'))
world <- st_read(here('map_1/countries/ne_10m_admin_0_countries.shp'))
```

```{r}
world <- world %>% select(SOVEREIGNT, MAPCOLOR9, POP_EST, CONTINENT, REGION_UN, SUBREGION, LABEL_X, LABEL_Y, geometry)
population <- population %>% select(SOV0NAME, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, POP_MAX, geometry)
airports <- airports %>% select(featurecla, type, name, scalerank, abbrev, geometry)

merged_data <- st_join(world, population, by = c("SOV0NAME" = "SOVEREIGNIT")) %>%
  rename(geom_world = geometry.x, geom_popu = geometry.y)


View(merged_data)
```
